lead_paragraph: A celebration of the 50th anniversary of the seminal “Revelations” will be among the highlights of the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater’s 2010 season at City Center, the company announced.
snippet: A celebration of the 50th anniversary of the seminal “Revelations” will be among the highlights of the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater’s 2010 season at City Center, the company announced.

byline.original: By JULIE BLOOM; Compiled by RACHEL LEE HARRIS
